14 .v. 1974
, M. Kaplan (
1 ♂
); Sinai, Wadi Tlach,
15 .vii. 1974
, A. Freidberg (
1 ♂
); Sinai, Wadi Geragenia, 2000 m ,
16 .vii. 1974
, A. Freidberg ( 1 ♀); Sinai, Taba,
1 .v. 1996
, A. Freidberg (
1 ♂
); Sinai, Wadi Ahmar 2000–2300m ,
25 .iv. 1998
, A. Freidberg & F. Kaplan ( 1 ♀); Sinai, Wadi Tinia 1800–2000m ,
26 .iv. 1998
, A. Freidberg & F. Kaplan ( 1 ♀); Sinai, St. Katarina 40 km . NE,
27 .iv. 1998
, A. Freidberg & F. Kaplan (
1 ♂
).

Distribution. Tropical and subtropical regions of nearly the entire world. General distribution in Israel :
Fig. 70
.

Previous records.
Bodenheimer, 1937
: 205 (“ Palestine ”);
Linnavuori, 1961
: 37 (many localities).

Biology. This species was found in Israel on
Tamarix tetragyna
and
T . nilotica
. It was also recorded from fields and on herbs, and was bred for biological pest control (
Kerzhner, 1981
).
